name: Chicks
description:

>>>

now w/ OVER 5 MILLION DOWNLOADS!

>>>

one day, a group of chicks was exploring a meadow when they discovered a mysterious hole in the ground. being curious and innocent little creatures, they decided to poke their heads in for a look.

little did they know it was a portal to another dimension!

now the chicks have fallen into a strange world of obstacles, deserts, and glaciers, and they need your help to escape!

use the tools at the bottom of the screen to guide these chicks back to the meadow before time runs out and the portal closes!

>>>

• delightful animation
• 32 unique levels
• 4 whimsical environments
• 8 different tools
• fast-forward button
• double tap zooming
• tap & drag panning
• nuclear dust-buster

>>>
